name: Affiliate Disclosure for WooCommerce
author: WPExplorer

sections.description:
This plugin is an addon for WooCommerce which adds a new tab in the Customizer Panel so you can enter a custom affiliate disclosure text on your WooCommerce products.

You can enable the disclosure so it only displays on affiliate/external products or on all products. You can also select your placement from several available WooCommerce hooks (before button form, after button form, before button, after button, product meta start or productmeta end), alter the default font size and top/bottom padding.

Disclaimer

sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin
  2. Go to Appearance > Customize > WooCommerce > Affiliate Disclosure
  3. Enter your custom text into the “Affiliate Disclosure Text” field (html is allowed)
  4. Modify the available settings to fit your needs

sections.reviews:
FTC affiliate disclosure - Perfect

By calcan on January 13, 2023

This is an excellent and much needed plugin, perfect for affiliate sites that require a FTC affiliate disclosure statement on each of their products.

Highly recommend.
